title: 126: The Amazon Holiday Gift Guide Episode!
itunes:title: The Amazon Holiday Gift Guide Episode!
description: In this week’s episode, Lisa, Mikey, and Jamie share some great holiday gift ideas for virtually anyone! Gifts like: the sock of the month club, beauty advent calendars, gifts for peanut butter lovers, gifts for pet lovers, gifts for snackers, and SO MUCH MORE! Plus a super-cool product that seamlessly removes those annoying fuzzies on sweaters! So what are you waiting for? Push play now, and then when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for a list of all the gift ideas mentioned in the episode! P.S. Make sure you listen all the way through to find out how you could win some of these finds!
itunes:summary: Gift-giving season has begun, and HG is here to help you find the perfect presents on AMAZON!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
